summary: Increased radii for Candlelight & Magelight spells.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=5][b]Click [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/9180/?][u]here[/u][/url] for Special Edition version[/b][/size][/center]
[u][b]Spell-Light Radius[/b][/u]

Increases radii of the Candlelight & Magelight spells.

This is a quick mod I made this for my own play through, as I don't think the default radius can cut it with any realistic lighting mods installed. I decided to upload it purely because I didn't see any mods that do the same without making additional changes not to my taste. Although I made this for use with ELFX, it should be fine with any realistic lighting, darker nights or darker dungeon mods.

The Candlelight spell radius has been increased to approximately 5x vanilla. Slightly larger than the torch radius with ELFX and approximately double that of the vanilla torch.

The radius for Magelight spell has been doubled from vanilla. This means it's the same as the torch radius with ELFX and approximately double that of the vanilla torch.


[u][b]Installation Instructions:[/b][/u]

Automatic Installation: (Recommended)
Download and install using Nexus Mod Manager.

Manual Install:
Download and extract “Spell Light Radius.esp” to “SkyrimData” and enable via the Skyrim launcher or your preferred mod manager.


[b][u]Compatibility:[/u][/b]

100% compatible with any mod that does not affect the Candlelight or MagicLight spells. This mod only edits the light sources labelled “MagicLightLightSpellHand01” and “MagicLightLightSpell01”. Needless to say, it will conflict with any mods that edit these. This mod will be fine with other that change only the duration and/or magicka cost for these spells.
